trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 管理用户界面相关的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Each Adorner can be enabled and disabled.
trans-unit.target: 可以启用和禁用每个装饰器。

trans-unit.source: Only enabled Adorner objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 仅启用的装饰器对象将收到来自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>的命中的测试和绘制消息

trans-unit.source: An Adorner can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 装饰器可被视为用户界面之间的代理相关的元素，包含所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>对象和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[行为服务概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The Adorner constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
trans-unit.target: 装饰器构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>和默认处于启用状态，。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>与关联<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>，集合设置此属性，以便<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>可以回调到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>与关联<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置值，该值指示如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>已启用。

trans-unit.source: If the Enabled property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用属性为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类将发送`HitTest`和`Paint`消息到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>启用; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: 强制<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>刷新其修饰工具窗口。

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 强制<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>刷新其修饰工具窗口内的给定<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 要使之无效的区域。

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 强制<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>刷新其修饰工具窗口内的给定<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>要使其无效。
